website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm FinePix S700 would be a nice budget megazoom if it weren't hampered by mediocre performance and a frustrating design.
pros: optical zoom operates in movie mode

customer_reviews.title: Now to Get the Pix onto a Computer
customer_reviews.text: I've had an earliers version of this camnrea. Same model, however. Problem now is, where may I obtain a dable to download the images to a Mac computer? Fuji's site is no help, Best Buy has nothing appropriate, and Walmart's photo department is no help. Ideas,please - send them to L.winckler@aol.com, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lange Winckler

customer_reviews.title: After many years, still a trooper
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for at least six years now (since 2007). Since then, it has withstood the test of time, been battered on hard objects, rained on, dripped on and even dropped. And that's only the beginning of how great this camera has held up. For its age, this Fuji S700 takes phenomenal photos. Although it is only 7.1 megapixels, the image quality that this camera produces is better than that of any cheap 16 megapixel camera. 10 times optical zoom still comes in handy as well. I am so pleased that I purchased this camera so many years and thousands of pictures ago.
customer_reviews.author: Green Iguana

customer_reviews.title: Still producing fabulous photos
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera since July 2007. I am a point and shoot person with little real knowledge of photography. This camera, however, makes me look like a pro. The photos are clear and crisp with billiant colors. At maximum zoom across a football field the detail is clear and perfect. I now have to wrestle my camera away from my daughter (somehow the camera now lives with her) who uses it to take photos of my grandson's sports and school activities. She posted some of the football photos on Facebook and got rave reviews on the great quality of the picutures. The s700 Turned out to be a great camera for a miminmal investiment with no performance problems.
customer_reviews.author: Be Informed Not Fooled

customer_reviews.title: be all and do all of digital cameras
customer_reviews.text: No moving parts or lens that will malfunction in the presence of dirt, sand, dust. multifunction viewer whether on screen or viewfinder, fully adjustable picture size, and focus range. batteries last a long time. I have taken over 700 pics with the original non-rechargeable batteries. the 1 gig data chip, included, holds over 1750 jpeg photos. a nice compact SLR type bodied camera that works well. For those using the Sony handheld accessory GPS while taking pictures, the camera works with the GPS to note location, time, mapping, position, and so on. I use the camera for crime scene investigations, and am well pleased with the overall product, accessory kit, and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: DRYWASHER-BILL

customer_reviews.title: a great all-around digital camera
customer_reviews.text: After looking around stores and online, I finally settled on the Fuji S700 camera. It has all of the features I have been looking for. It is light; easy to use; and versatile. And, I had gotten rave reviews from friends who use the Fuji. My primary use is for my hobby of nature photography. I have also used it for family pictures, and anything else that comes up. I have even used it for work. The instructions are easy to follow. And, it works perfectly with my iMac and iPhoto software. The price from Amazon was lower than any of the stores in my area.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrell

customer_reviews.title: Review of Fujifilm S700
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera at a fantastic price. Although this camera does not have optical image stabalization it will minimize camera shake by pushing up the "film speed" and hence the shutter speed. The electronic viewfinder is great when shooting in bright condtions and the LCD becomes hard to see. Lots of modes and manual control over most everything. Picture quality is super for my intents and puposes. The owners manual can take a while to digest as some of the translation is a bit poor. These and even many point and shoot digital cameras these days are so feature laden that you almost need to have the manual along all the time.
customer_reviews.author: B.C. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2007 as a stepping stone to a DSLR, used it for about a year. When I upgraded to a Canon DSLR, I gave this to my mother, and she is still using it today. She was as happy as I was with it. It takes pretty good quality pictures, though I wasn't always impressed by the low-light responsiveness, even with the flash. Overall, though, it did a good job. I recommend to anyone looking for an inexpensive camera that feels a little better in the hands than one of the small, square, point-and-shoot models.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am in no way a proficient photographer. I wanted a camera that would be easy to use and yet had a variety of settings to allow filming under various circumstances. This camera provided me with everything I needed. I was taking pictures right out of the box in the auto setting and reading the instruction manual allowed me to use various settings to achieve the effects I wanted. I think it's a very good camera for the uninitiated like myself to get into photography at a very reasonable price. 7 years later I still love this camera. The close up setting allows a beautiful shot of roses.
customer_reviews.author: Veloman

customer_reviews.title: what a deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: i uprgraded after i dropped my s5100 for the 4th or 5th time and finally broke it. WOW!!! the bells and whistles on this camera are useful for when you want to just be a point and shoot kind of photographer and there are enough adjustments and to let you take some serious photos as well. more pixels do not always transfer into a better camera. speed between shots, ease of use, and the ability to see and make adjustments in low light or bright light are also very important. the ability to take a picture with flash and without at the same time is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: cheffy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera with better picture quality than a compact camera, manual options and lots of settings, ease of use, but yet nowhere near SLR price. I Definately found the perfect match with this one. I took a chance and preordered this beauty and I am so glad I did. After just a few minutes I was taking great photographs with a amazing clarity and quality. I highly recommend the Fuji Finepix s700. It's is a great price too! Don't miss out on this one, you'll be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SVT

customer_reviews.title: good kickin camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was awesome right out of the box. We just had twins and decided we need a better camera to take pictures of our kids. Its is great. The options to take multiple photos at once, the flash not flash photo option is also great. The menus are simple, the display is clear. SUpermacro takes some insane close ups. The only fault i would list is the battery door is a little fragile. Overall I would say its a great point and shoot camera, with some added features. Oh its also one of the cheapest in the inbetween category of not quite slr, but better than the small point and shooters.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition, exactly what I wanted, fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I had this model and loved it...probably took a million pics with it. Then I got a newer model-better zoom, more megapixels etc....but, the response time on the new model was soo slow! I was glad to find the old model still available...and even more happy that it arrived in "new" condition! I love this camera-the pics are great, response time unbelievable (I take a lot of pics while going 70mph on the back of a motorcycle), and the option to view from the eye piece or the screen is imperative for my shooting conditions! The seller was very prompt in getting this product to me also. In fact, we (my hubby) have already used him again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy U

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700
customer_reviews.text: The Fujifilm Finepix S700 is an older camera that the company no longer makes. I had one previously that I sent back to the company to try to get it repaired. They told me that I could pay to purchase a comparable camera, but they wouldn't be able to fix mine since they no longer make it. I have 2 other models of Fujifilm cameras. Each one has it's strong points, but THIS camera is the absolute best for taking pictures of people. I take pictures of the high school band kids and this camera never fails to take excellent pictures of them!
customer_reviews.author: Izzie Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Fine Pix S700 digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Used this camera with good results in most situations, but it was not able to focus with the lens extended to maximum telephoto. Reducing the extension slightly settled it down and it would focus. Unit is very light, and easy to handle, with simple controls. A decent camera for the price. Have since passed it on to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this camera
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this camera to focus properly - it is just off. I have tried the manual focus which is lame. It does not work. I have used the auto focus, and that is worse. The pictures (indoors with photo lights) are dark, and the colors are a bit off. Outdoors the auto setting works great. This camera needs a great deal of light to get the pictures to look like what you are shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: RE: Fujilm Finepix S700- Good images/poor construction
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great camera, but unfortunately the flash mechanism stopped popping up as it should. I used a folded piece of paper to hold it up so I could use the flash. Takes great images; viewfiender design/fab poor. I would buy another Fuji product and hope the build quality is better. I requested a repair estimate - $175 (the price of the camera). No help (as usual).....
customer_reviews.author: J. Pepoon

customer_reviews.title: This camera Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I bought this camera - I like the zoom on the video while I am taking movies - I have the 5300 and I liked it but no zoom while video. I get really good battery life out of this camera - Great Price - little larger than a pocket camera but then it will zoom you right in - I like the fact that the lens is always out and that it has a instant on so you have a better chance of getting that shot. This is a really nice camera. Super Macro Rocks too.
customer_reviews.author: iDebraW

customer_reviews.title: After 7 years I am still in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera at May 2007. Ever since that I captured so many precious moments with this camera. Vibrant color, 10X long zoom, the pitures are so great. It is old now but I am still use it occationally. Fujifilm camera always take pictures with great vivid color. The only draw back is it can not handle low light situation well.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes excellent pictures. I have never had a camera before with 10x optical zoom, and it is amazing, the difference. I got this for a $40 warehouse deal, so it was just an amazing bargain. I am very happy with it. I know I can't compare to the other reviewer's detailed review on the camera, but as an amateur photographer, it has been a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Just another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A Superb Product and a Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the price and features of this camera, I ran-did-not-walk. Even so, I was skeptical until it arrived; then, it delivered on all its promises, including the raves of most of the reviewers. This has all the versatility of much more expensive SLR's and lacks only interchangable lenses. Know what? My last film SLR had a zoom lens on it an I never used any of the other fixed focal length lenses that I had. So, no loss there. To the reviewer who was bummed out: check all the adjustments again; it took me a little while to get the hang of some of it, too. This camera has a few differences in setup from my previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Noel B. Perlman

customer_reviews.title: Glare is no problem
customer_reviews.text: This line of cameras has both a LCD display and a viewfinder. With my old camera in the sunshine my LCD panel faded out. I had to point and hope I had gotten the subject of the shot. Many digital cameras don't have a viewfinder. With this camera you should never miss a shot due to glare. The viewfinder is less of a drain on the battery too. The ten times zoom is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gorrow

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price for such a great camera. The various features, and types of shots are fantastic. The 10x optical zoom is not bad, but I felt it could be better. Quality is excellent with the 7.1 megapixels, but each picture takes up a lot of space/memory with over 1mb per shot. If you like quality this is a great camera, if you rather conserve space/memory you might want to shop around, however there are settings on the camera where you can lower the resolution. Video setting on the camera is ok too, very clear but again takes up a great amount of memory on your card.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years the flash won't pop up
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this camera. I consider the photo qualities to be excellent. I think the number of megapixels is just fine for general use. However, over the years, the flash has stopped popping up. You have to manually lift it and hold it with one finger to take flash pictures. In the future, I will avoid buying cameras with spring loaded pop up flash units.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but limited
customer_reviews.text: If you use this camera in good lighting & use the auto mode you'll find you'll be very happy over a typical point & shoot, especially when it comes to the 10x zoom which affords great freedom in composition. Unfortunately low light situations without flash are a real challenge for this camera, and the manual mode controls are a bit fiddly to deal with. I bought this as I thought it would be a good semi-slr solution but ended up replacing it with a Canon G9 instead, which for me is the perfect solution for anyone looking for the perfect compromise between point and shoot and SLR.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: best camera I have purchased yet
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this FujiS700 7.1 mp 10X. It takes clear pictures and also easy to manage. The only thing I'm not sure of, is the CD that came with it for downloading pictures. Every time you download, it downloads all the pictures again - it double up. I would recommend this camera for anyone that wants a clear picture and the zoom is excellent and very clear.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Coudn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I took the camera out of it's box I knew I had something special. Auto is easy to use and my pictures came out crystal clear. Yes the instruction book is excellent,the camera has a lot to offer. Why people complained about the cd I have no idea. It is easier to use than any of the other programs I have. Thanks Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: FujiFinepix S700
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they don't make these anymore and the new ones have faults. You have to Google to find these but they are very nice cameras with lots of good features and they take excellent photos. I used one of these in Africa for my photo safaris. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vee Ell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. I picked it out for my husband to get me as an xmas gift. I have several digital cameras (Sony and Cannon) and I have to say that this one is the BEST!! I love the zoom and it takes the most amazing clear pics!! It has many diff features that I LOVE. I consider myself an amature photographer and will use this camera for a very long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Werkele

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital Camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a digital SLR, but without the bulk. I was unhappy with my tiny Canon that had HORRIBLE red eye reduction so I decided to try this Fujifilm. I am so please with it. It takes great pictures, has great red eye reduction and isn't bulky like our big SLR. If you want a great SLR without the $1k price tag (and less weight) this is the one to try!
customer_reviews.author: T. Eley

customer_reviews.title: Great product, minimum downsides
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well and has a really nice price, minor problems observed up to the moment (only had it for a week): a slight deformation when photographing objects with straight borders located close to the edge of the frame, no "disk mode" forces you to install the included software (huge and poorly featured) or use a card reader to download pictures, the macro could be better. Nevertheless, I think it was a great buy for the price and features, even if the 2gig card wasn't included.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Digital Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! Great shots, quick shooting, video and still, 10X zoom is amazing! Close up and super close up settings (Macro), enables you to put audio to you still shots too!! Took on a mission trip to Jamaica and got 255 fantastic clear photos and 25 movies on one 2GB disk and everyone on the trip decided they want this camera!
customer_reviews.author: CurleyKai

customer_reviews.title: FinePix
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. Takes excellent pictures with ease. There are many good features, such as quick and easy playpack; connect to TV for viewing; protect frames when reviewing and lots more. The zoom is terrific for us amateurs. I will be using it in Alaska for some great distance shots. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quality pictures.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use, comfortable to hold and takes sharp pictures, I love the zoom, it allows me to zoom in on the subject 20 feet away, and take a full frame closeup with great detail. Great deal for the price. I also like the feature that allows you to use the screen for framing the pictue, or using the viewfinder like a traditional camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Hestand

customer_reviews.title: My first FUGI camera ~ WOW! This will not be my last. :o)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera! Easy to use, gorgeous pictures, nice, large LCD screen, 10x optical zoom is awesome AND a great price with free shipping thru Amazon (LOVE Amazon)... I couldn't be happier. I Have 4 Digital cameras, all Canon and Olympus, and this one is my new favorite! Buy it, you won't be sorry. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyed Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a new digital camera for months and reading all the reviews I finally decided on the Finepix S700 and I couldn't be happier! The camera is very easy to use and the pics are coming out great! I have yet to take a bad picture with this camera! The only downside to the camera is where the flash pop up is placed, it took me a while to correctly place my fingers so I didn't get hit when it comes up but other than that I have no complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: E. GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for a camera that was damaged during 2019 vacation..
customer_reviews.text: This is my second camera of this model from Fuji. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: My old standby
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little camera. OK, its not really that little and that's one of the down sides to it. Takes good pictures. I bought it for the optical zoom and it was hard to beat the price at the time. I've moved up to an SLR camera but this one served me well until the airlines killed it.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: For this price this camera is tops! Light weight, easy to use, great pictures. Love the zoom. Love the picture quality. I got this as a replacement for an older Canon model. Very satisfied with the camera and Amazon's great customer service for walking me through the SD card promotion.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnielu

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The Fuji S700 is an easy-to-use camera, affordable and the pictures are fantastic! I looked at the Fuji S1000, it is a 10mp where the S700 is a 7mp and there is no comparison. The S1000 has a lag with the shutter speed and it does not have an extended viewfinder. Having a choice of a viewfinder or a screen was important to me and since I would rather use the viewfinder, the batteries last longer. For years I have used a 35mm film camera and had no problem switching to this great digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Needed it for parts replacements
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for parts replacements, so now my camera is like new. it was more cost effective for us to buy this way and replace parts ourself then buying the part form the company.
customer_reviews.author: HANK

customer_reviews.title: For 200 Bucks, It's a Steal
customer_reviews.text: All of Fuji's digital cameras are excellent. This one is a steal considering how cheap it is and how many features it has. Only complaint, the refresh time is a little slow (it's been mentioned in other reviews) but other than that, this is an awesome, amazing, wondering camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I got this b/c I use the same model at work. Takes great photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera several years now and I love it. The things that were important to me; View Finder, Speed (it shoots almost instantly) and price. I like the AA batteries, they last a long time and I don't want to mess with charging. It's proven to be durable (dropped it a couple months ago with no harm) and simply takes great pictures. Video with sound is a bonus. My kids (I'm 60 now) have purchased the little dinky pocket cameras and they all like mine better. Now they're moving into this style camera. This is a well made camera and has never given me a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gracko

customer_reviews.title: Pleased as punch!
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight, easy to figure out, without the instruction "book"..(too big/heavy to take with me on trip to Europe) Very happy with it, but it took a while for me to remember to remove lens cover...no, I am NOT a blond! just not used to lens covers. Seriously, it's small enough to fit into a purse, and light enough to hang around your neck without being bothered by it, having had "pocket" type digitals before this was a concern...and my dear hubby dislikes anything hanging around his neck (except me!(for 43 years!) Doesn't seem to use too much energy, either, batteries seem to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: D Milani

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with Grainy Indoor Shots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera, because my 5mp Kodak's flash did not carry very far indoors (which made zooming indoors a lost cause) The s700 is much better in that area--the flash carries up to 15-20 feet, but the final results are grainy and disappointing. Outdoor pix are fabulous with the s700, but I have found that the majority of photos I shoot are indoors, and this 7mp camera can't hold a candle to the quality of the older 5mp Kodak that I have. Now, if I can just get the finishing quality of the Kodak with the flash capabilities of the s700 . . .
customer_reviews.author: JWard

customer_reviews.title: Great SLR like camera
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cameras, including an Olympus Evolt 500 (SLR), and a Fuji V10. This S700 takes great pictures and is easy to use. I haven't tried all of the settings, but I know it works great outdoors on Auto as I took some pictures of hummingbirds that came out crisp and clear. This camera is small enough to wear on your belt, but I usually use an over the shoulder case with a strap.
customer_reviews.author: MPTJR

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the money. Good low light pictures. Don't expect it to give $1000 quality pictures, but for a non-professional, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rees

customer_reviews.title: Built-in help
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and learn -- when you select a feature or mode, it momentarily displays a Help screen which descibes the feature or mode. This can be turned off once it is no longer needed. Do remember to keep your finger off the top of the camera, though -- the flash can't pop up and flash if you're holding it closed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not so much features.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a good product for someone who start the amateur way to do a couple of shots with the enough quality and take good pictures. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Posadas

customer_reviews.title: Plaeased
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Fuji S700 I have purchased & I really like the quality of pictures, range & ease of use. I purchased this camera because I dropped my old one, I just had to have another!
customer_reviews.author: Homeworks William Underwood

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera had proven to be a sensible investment. I bought it based on the good reviews I read here on Amazon, and I am yet to regret the purchase. It produces high quality shots in a variety of shooting conditions. I compared the camera with a friends higher priced canon and it held its own. Even beating out her camera in a few areas. I would definitely suggest that you pick one up for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: SirBee

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed using this camera until the 3 inch led screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using this camera until the 3 inch led screen blacked out. I called Fugi to have it repaired, would have cost more than the camera new.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Wlodarsky

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700 Value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. Terrific quality. Printed photos are lifelike. Highly recommend. Remember that the 10x optical zoom is most important. Also, this camera has both LCD and regular viewfinder. The latter being a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Living Life

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was better than expected. The reviews on this site really helped, and I really enjoy this camera. The settings are really easy to use, and the pictures are really amazing! If you want a step up from a regular point and shoot digital camera and don't want to pay over $500, this is definitely the choice for you. I literally stuck the batteries in and began shooting, anybody can handle it, but it has enough settings to satisfy the aspiring photographer. Great choice for the price range, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Derr

customer_reviews.title: Does a Magnificent Job
customer_reviews.text: We have no complaints about this camera. It takes great pictures and is easy to use. You can't go wrong with Fuji and Finepix.
customer_reviews.author: madmamalou

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning the camera but it's fun. I'm used to a much smaller camera that I can wear on my belt and whip out whenever I need it (months traveling last year). The small one is also a Fujifilm Finepix. I like the size and ease of the large viewer but prefer the optical viewfinder. Other improvements include: camera doesn't "stray" off settings, and on-off is easier. The zoom is a great function as well. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera but with the phones coming out with so much clarity I really have t used it as much...too bulky for travel
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Professional Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom, professional shots, lots of settings (night, portrait, etc etc etc) will have to take some time to figure it all out. only thing i think coud be improved is the fact that your finger can rest over the pop up flash sometimes blocking it. But great camera, love the zoom and loking fwd to taking more professional pics - the ones we took so far look pretty sharp!
customer_reviews.author: NDP

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have one myself and was very satisfied with the camera for the price. I purchased one for my daughter for Christmas because I Knew the camera took good pictures. I especially like the 10x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Faye Lescalleet

customer_reviews.title: love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am not camera savvy and in the past, I typically cut off heads and feet in my pictures. Not with this camera. I have had no trouble using it and the pictures make me out to be a professional. It really is a user friendly camera and it looks like a professional camera too, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Zorn

customer_reviews.title: fuji s700
customer_reviews.text: bought the camera for my dad, his first digital camera. i have the s5700 and thought this would be a great easy camera for him to use, and it is. its a great camera for the price and 17th st photo is the best
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Teeple

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best Under 200 bucks Camera out there. I have the best of both worlds. Solid Point and Click shooting. Or i can use one of the many high end features to do a semi professional shooting. Love it
customer_reviews.author: H.Neuman

customer_reviews.title: This is an awsome camera. Still working well today ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awsome camera. Still working well today many years later only a bit outdated with technology. However, it still is working well after thousands of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Prater

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who is an amateur photographer. He is happy with the camera. We are still discovering all the different settings. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Boots

customer_reviews.title: this was actually a replacement..
customer_reviews.text: the case of the one I had before broke, and I purchased this re-furbished camera body rather than an entire camera kit. above all, the Fuji's have been the best of the digital cameras we have owned, when balancing price and picture quality against real-world survivability.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best quality, easy to use cameras I've ever used. Unfortunately, mine was stolen a few weeks ago, but because I loved this camera so much, I bought another one to replace it. It is lightweight, yet still feels solid. The macro function is excellent. and the all around color and focusing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Ready

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the money. Long battery life. Camera doesn't seem to work well in low light but I would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of use and quality of pics
customer_reviews.text: The camera works like a charm. We wanted something that took good quality photos with ease of shooting. This was the ticket. Can use this camera on automatic or manual settings.
customer_reviews.author: CindyT

customer_reviews.title: Finepix S700
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for both of my daughters(ages 21 & 23). They absolutely love these cameras. Technical enough to take a great picture, simple enough not to scare them. Wonderful Zoom. Oldest daughter has become very interested in photography. Camera is so much better than a pocket camera, yet still not too big to be cumbersome or frumpy. Have bought three of these cameras so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Arford

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix
customer_reviews.text: Loved this camera....... Pictures turned out really good and enlargements did not turn out blurry at all. Could have been a little smaller for portability in handbags. Biggest problem I found is this camera was very reasonable, but looks very expensive so someone decided to take off with it. Nice. Otherwise awesome. Would the thief please return my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Schwebke

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix S700
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the $$$. It has many capabilities which take a little time to learn -- more than a Canon Power Shot-sort. I love the ability to capture action. You can set it to take many shots rapidly, so it's like a SLR, but for much less. I'm still learning the features, but appreciate each one as I master it. Prints are spectacular and the camera looks very pro-fessional! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: CR loves this camera. We love this camera. We wish the lens cover opened automatically but it's easy enough to use as is.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: only minor criticism
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital camera, and I used it mostly in "auto" mode. A couple of pictures in "macro" mode came out looking overexposed, but the ones in auto mode are very good. The camera has a very wide zoom range and a lot of megapixels for a small price. I'm still on the learning curve with it, but it appears to be a very good selection.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. So I haven't had a chance to play around with it a lot. However I did try some shots with this camera. The picture quality is great. 10x zoom is very quick. Interface is very simple and friendly. The best part is the looks. It looks like an SLR and feels very solid. At around 200$ this camera is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Schwinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does a nice job with closeups, video function is a great feature and is very stable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JKammer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Second time ordering it. Lost the first one and was really thankful that amazon kept a record of when I brought this from them (2007). Dad loved the camera as well. Takes really good photos handles well.
customer_reviews.author: Conworks

customer_reviews.title: Fuji digital camera S700
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to get nice sharp pictures for internet sales. It's many features make it easy and the quality of images has much improved over my old Kodak digital. Software a breeze, all aspects easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera because of the features, low cost, and brand reliability. The large LCD screen is easy to see, even in bright sunlight. The picture quality is comparable to much more expensive camera setups. The camera is so easy to use, the only thing we referenced the manual on was how to attach the neck strap.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Berger

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product and also the fast delivery time! Great price! I LOVE MY CAMERA!!
customer_reviews.author: T. COOK

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a replacement for another older Fuji that died. This camera is great!! With 10x zoom and all the other features this camera has. WOW!! Good battery life and the price makes it all worth it. Buy this camera and be happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Easy...Fun...great pics
customer_reviews.text: This is our first camera and we just can't stop taking pics. My only con to this product is because I am a novice I cannot set the shutter speed fast enough to capture lightning--I love storms. Other than that this camera is fun, easy to use and take outstanding pics.
customer_reviews.author: Pastorskinner

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price. My only issue is that there is a pretty large amount of purple fringing present on some photos, even so, I think it is a pretty good camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything it boasts with ease! I couldn't be happier. For the price, I would recommend this camera to all. Very happy with the battery life. If your looking to move up one step from your pocket camera, give this one a try! The 10X optical is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: really great cam
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this camera, i think for the price you can do no better then this cam, A+
customer_reviews.author: George K

customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely wonderful. I recommend it for anybody who's an avid amateur who doesn't want a simple point and shoot and for people who are more experienced but don't want to spend a lot of money on DSLR cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Mishel Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Amateur Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has taken some incredibly great shots. The macro mode is truly ingenious and I really love the amazing pictures I get from it. I highly recommend this camera to any serious amateur photographer, and to anyone who loves to take great, easy pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs true stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: very good, but after using Panasonic with a true stabilizer, this camera needs one, otherwise great for the price. gychang
customer_reviews.author: gychang

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER HOMERUN FOR FUJI DIGITAL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this digital camera because of the great experiences of my two daughters with their Fuji digital cameras. I have owned and used both Canon and Nikon digital cams and been disappointed. This camera is fantastic. Easy to use and produces perfectly beautiful digital images. Thanks to Fuji and Amazon for offering it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Camera
customer_reviews.text: It was here the date it was supposed to! that i liked a lot. first thing, I noticed was how dirty the camera was! like dirty there was dirt things stuck to it. I know its a used camera but come on! Second, looks like some pixels are missing from the LCD screen, I think the screen was hit, that could have caused the dead pixels. Third, There was pictures in the camera. Fourth, the flash does not close all the way. But what else can you expect from a used item right? But all in all, I love the camera takes good pictures a lot of features.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Abdul

customer_reviews.title: FAB U LUS
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with a camera then I am with this one. the pictures are just amazing, the clarity of the zoom is wonderful. it is all I wished for and more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rellez

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves this Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the 10x optical zoom and the viewfinder (rather than the lcd screen) for composing her shots. She is not a sophisticated photographer, just point and shoot kind of stuff. The camera serves her needs beautifully, and the images are beautifully sharp and colorful.. She loves this camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. MURRAY

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Fuji S700 digital camera
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a realllly nice digital camera, I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Okie from the handle

customer_reviews.title: good except in low light
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this so she could take pictures at a concert - it takes wonderful pictures until it's dark out. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Mcclanahan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice and product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera to begin on the world's photografers amateur, i bought this camera and the price for the quality is the best choice! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: this Fujifilm Finepix S700 has been a true pleasure to own and use. While not an SLR, it does provide the 'through the lens' perspective of an SLR without the moving parts, and at a much smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: grthinker

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700 Review
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding value for the price paid. It has everything I wanted to add to the capabilities of my other cameras, 10X zoom and a long flash capability, 20 feet or more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon A. Buckler

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera !
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera because it had a great 10x zoom for under $250. It works great for the money. Recommend for anybody looking for a good entry level camera but want something a little more that the point and shoots that have saturated the market lately.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix s700 Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! The optical zoom is great--wish they all had bigger zooms. Fairly easy to operate, although my husband has trouble because he hits the wrong buttons with his hands. Go figure. I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Loie

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay camera i guess ... it kills the batteries way too quickly. and it actually came as is, no cords
customer_reviews.author: Nelle A

customer_reviews.title: Horrible indoor photos
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, grainy, blurry indoor photos. Tried every setting imaginable, still terrible. Outdoor photos only average. Sorry I ever purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Music Fan

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Finepix S700 7.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom
product_meta.description:
Fujifilm Finepix S700 7.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Manufacturer Description The Fujifilm FinePix S700 is for anyone seeking an affordable long-zoom digital camera. The powerful 10x optical zoom lens and 1/2.5-inch, 7-megapixel standard CCD imager helps you capture perfect images. Dual media slots (SD/MMC and xD-Picture Card) give you more storage options, while the 2.5-inch LCD display helps you capture each image perfectly. Other features include multiple exposure modes, auto & manual focus, 8 white balance modes (including a custom hold mode) and a six-mode popup flash. There's plenty in the Fuji FinePix S700 to cater to the needs of advanced amateurs looking to gain maximum control over their photos. 

 Fuji FinePix S700 Highlights 

 

Fujinon lens technology The S700 features a 10x optical zoom with a 35mm focal range equivalent of 38-380mm. Bring your subject closer and clearer with high-quality Fujinon lens technology.  Picture stabilization Fast moving subject? No problem. Fujifilm's Picture Stabilization technology utilizes the heightened sensitivity of the FinePix S700 at ISO 1600 and high-speed shutter settings to prevent camera shake or freeze subject movement, keeping blur to a minimum. This easy to access feature (selectable on the mode dial) let's the FinePix S700 choose the correct light sensitivity and best-matching shutter speed automatically, for the highest quality digital pictures. 

 i-Flash Intelligent Flash i-Flash fine-tunes flash output for shooting with high-sensitivity settings. It recognizes scene conditions and determines the optimum flash output to ensure superb results. Subjects in the foreground appear natural, and background detail is bright and clear. The difference is especially noticeable in the natural facial tones of people in your pictures, in close-ups and group photos alike. 

 

2.5-inch LCD display and Electronic Viewfinder The FinePix S700 features two different ways to frame and view your shot. Choose from either the large, 2.5-inch 230k pixel LCD Display, or the .24-inch 230k pixel Electronic Viewfinder. Both offer a 60/fps refresh rate, and a brilliantly bright and detailed view of your image in either shooting or playback mode.  Dual media slot convenience The Finepix S700 features a xD/SD compatible slot, allowing the use of either xD Picture Card or SD media to store and transfer your photos. This new capability assures compatibility with a wider variety of applications than ever before, and allows users to choose the media technology that is right for them.
feature_bullets: 7.1-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 15 x 20-inch prints
2.5-inch LCD screen; 10x optical zoom, 48x Total zoom
Movie mode at 30fps with sound in Motion JPEG (.AVI) format
Picture Stabilization mode; Mode Dial for ease of use
Compatible with SD and xD media cards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars356 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
